name: Indiana Maria Braga
description:
Maria Braga is trying to make the best recipe and need the best ingredients to do it.

This is a project for a 4 days sprint game jam like production for a client.
Rudá Moreira: Programmer.
Pedro Thiers: Game Designer.
Lucas Thiers: Artist.
Hannah Cardoso: Artist.

Features:
  • Jump
  • Soar
  • Huge nasty cockroaches
  • Food
  • Score
  • Handsome mascot
